snippet: The land, now a park in Quebec City, was the site of a pivotal battle between the French and British. On Sept. 1, it will have its first for-profit concert.
abstract: The land, now a park in Quebec City, was the site of a pivotal battle between the French and British. On Sept. 1, it will have its first for-profit concert.

headline.main: Canada Bends Rules for Madonna Concert at the Plains of Abraham
